title: Project Proposal
content: We first begin with submitting our project proposal, containing the proposed fields and tasks for each member. This ensures that everyone is on the same page and that the project progresses smoothly.

title: Start of Website
content: During this day, Justin started drafting the website, which is our main platform for presenting this project. Our website includes an introduction, articles, a summary, reflections, a timeline, and the members of the group.

title: Articles
content: We start writing articles about the proposed fields. Each member begins to write articles in their proposed field. After writing the article, the members check the content of the articles with each other. On Nov. 26, we finalized the articles in each proposed field.
